meanings.definition: In a neat and orderly manner.
meanings.sent1: She arranged her books tidily on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: He always completes his tasks tidily and efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored its nuts tidily in a row.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed tidily in the garden, creating a beautiful display.
meanings.sent5: The chef chopped the vegetables tidily, with precision and care.

meanings.definition: Done in a way that is clean and organized.
meanings.sent1: The tidily folded laundry was put away in the drawers.
meanings.sent2: She kept her desk tidily arranged with all her supplies in order.
meanings.sent3: The cat groomed itself tidily, making sure every fur was in place.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle pieces fit together tidily, forming a perfect picture.
meanings.sent5: The tidily wrapped gift looked beautiful with its bow and ribbon.
